mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pwd, type, name, tell, status, confirm, grade, role, joindate, finaldate, birth) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{type}, #{name}, #{tell}, 1, #{confirm}, '일반', 'ROLE_USER', now(), now(), #{birth})
